channel.title: Southeastern Baptist Theological Seminary - Video Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Southeastern Baptist Theological Seminary
channel.itunes:subtitle: SEBTS Video Podcast
channel.description: Southeastern Baptist Theological Seminary's Podcast consists of chapel and conference messages, devotionals and promotional information in both audio and video format. Southeastern hopes you will find this information instructive and encouraging in your walk with Jesus Christ as world renowned pastors, preachers and professors teach God's Word and discuss important biblical topics related to the church and our culture. You can learn more about Southeastern Baptist Theological Seminary by visiting us on the web at www.sebts.edu.
channel.itunes:summary: Southeastern Baptist Theological Seminary's Podcast consists of chapel and conference messages, devotionals and promotional information in both audio and video format. Southeastern hopes you will find this information instructive and encouraging in your walk with Jesus Christ as world renowned pastors, preachers and professors teach God's Word and discuss important biblical topics related to the church and our culture. You can learn more about Southeastern Baptist Theological Seminary by visiting us on the web at www.sebts.edu.
